amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for mifepristone, commonly known as RU-486, for any purpose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for mifepristone, commonly known as RU-486, for any purpose.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 176 (Roll no. 445).
